refnamediv.refpurpose: Site-wide configuration file for deejayd, a media player daemon.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The file /etc/deejayd.conf is an INI like file which configures deejayd. The format looks like this :

informalexample.programlisting:
[sectionname] variable = value othervariable = othervalue
[othersection] foo = bar

refsect1.title: general section
refsect1.para: This section defines the general section configuration values for all of deejayd components.

listitem.para: Log level. Possible values are error to log only errors, info to be more verbose and debug to log all messages.
Replaygain support, yes or no.
The chosen media backend. Possible values are : auto for whichever works, trying first with Vlc, vlc for the Vlc backend, gstreamer for the GStreamer backend.
a list of plugins to activate separated by ','. Available plugins are : audioscrobbler to activate lastfm audioscrobbler

refsect1.title: net section
refsect1.para: This section defines the net section configuration values. This defines all that relates to the TCP XML messaging interface to deejayd.

listitem.para: Remote control using XML messages, yes or no.
The numerical TCP port number to listen on for XML messages, yes or no.
The hostname(s), the IP address(es) of the network ipv4 interface to listen on for XML messages, or all to listen on all available interfaces.

refsect1.title: webui section
refsect1.para: This section defines the webui section configuration values. This defines all that relates to the HTTP web user interface to deejayd.

listitem.para: Remote control using the HTTP web ui, yes or no.
The numerical TCP port number to listen on for HTTP request. yes or no. You can then access the web ui by pointing your browser to http://deejayd-host:port/.
The hostname(s), the IP address(es) of the network ipv4 interface to listen on for HTTP requests, or all to listen on all available interfaces.
Root URL for the webui. This defines where the webui is located in the embedded web server. Default is /.

example.title: root_url = /p/dj
example.para: This value will make your webui available at http://media:6880/p/dj/.

listitem.para: This can be used if you want to make your webui available in a subdirectory of another web server, e.g. a reverse proxy using apache2.

refsect1.title: database section
refsect1.para: This section defines the database section configuration values. This defines all that relates to the internal media database used by deejayd.

listitem.para: The full path to the sqlite database file.

refsect1.title: mediadb section
refsect1.para: This section defines the mediadb section configuration values. This defines all that relates to the relationship between you media files and deejayd and its database.
Symlinked directories in both audio and video locations will be followed and watched if inotify is supported.

listitem.para: The full path to the directory holding you music files.
The full path to the directory holding you video files.
The character set to use to decode your filenames. This should probably be autodetected.
The full path to cache album covers in.

refsect1.title: webradio section
refsect1.para: This section defines the webradio section configuration values.

listitem.para: Boolean used to enable icecast webradio sources.
URL of the XML directory of icecast webradio to use.

refsect1.title: video section
refsect1.para: This section defines the video section configuration values. Those options are specific to the video media playback in deejayd.

listitem.para: Fullscreen video. This is mainly a debugging configuration value and you want this to be set to yes if you use the video mode. Set this to no if you want to be able to control deejayd using some graphical client on the same display.
The X display to play the video to. Usually :0.0.
On-screen display enabled yes or no.
The On-screen display font size, an integer.

refsect1.title: gstreamer section
refsect1.para: This section defines the gstreamer section configuration values. Those options are specific to the GStreamer backend.

listitem.para: The audio output sink to use in gstreamer. This is usually one among autoaudiosink (default), alsasink, pulsesink, etc.
The speaker setup you use for sound output. Possible values are stereo (default), 4channel, 5channel, 51channel, ac3passthrough.
The video output sink to use in gstreamer. This is usually one among autovideosink (default), ximagesink, xvimagesink, etc.
you can also set option for this sink.

refsect1.title: vlc section
refsect1.para: This section defines the vlc section configuration values. Those options are specific to the VLC backend.

listitem.para: The output device to use. This is usually one among auto, alsa, oss, pulse, etc.
Boolean to define whether to output video (mainly for unit testing purposes).

refsect1.title: lastfm section
refsect1.para: This section defines the lastfm plugin section configuration values.

listitem.para: Your lastfm login.
A MD5 hash of your lastfm password.
